name: (Un)Loved
description: A woman named Flora has found herself stuck in her own memories. In there, she meets Lumine, a strange wisp-like creature that seems to know Flora's memories well. By controlling both Flora and Lumine, the player must help Flora understand why she is there and how all of this connects, getting to know more and more about her past, her feelings and the most important thing of all; her love for herself.
